item.description:
At Relish: Center for Urban Agricuture, in Union Sq Somerville, opening June 1. This is one of the first events. From the description:

Ready to start or expand your urban farm? Curious about chickens and bees? Come with your neighbors and learn about the opportunities right in your backyard.

Cities around the country are responding to resident interests in farming with guidelines that balance a desire to support these efforts and share information on best practices with the needs of neighbors.

Presentations from local officials and residents from area towns about regulations and resources and a Q & A session.

Light refreshments provided.

Tickets are $8 or free (!) with code KissAFarmer. Please pay if you can to help cover the cost of refreshments for the events.

The event is ticketed and space is limited, so use the link below to register and Â secure your ticket.

http://relish6-5-13-eorg.eventbrite.com/
item.name: Urban Agriculture Today: Opportunities and Ordinances
